ygData.subject: The trainers return

From: cyberwolf4@...

Prebon worried about the disappearance of Slayer, finally the scans 
got a lock.

Prebon, I have a positive lock on Slayers position. he's buried in 
the mountains not to far from where his last report was." Blaze 
called out from his station.

"Send Ignatius to retrieve him immediately." Prebon responded 
irritably slamming his hand on the wall. A tiny drop of mech fluid 
dripped from his hand. he caught it and squeezed it as if it were one 
of his enemies. "We need Slayers knowledge of the Maximals if we are 
to defeat them."

A bald Eagle flew low to avoid Maximal scanners. He was close to the 
ark and knew they wouldn't be happy to see him. he swooped low and 
located the nearly frozen Slayer in stasis lock. Slayer was missing a 
limb as well as most of his mech fluid. Ignatius quickly transformed 
and put his arms around Slayer. he lifted the injured bots head and 
checked it's status. The rescuer transformed and once again an eagle 
floated above the ground. the great bird grabbed its prey and started 
flying back to the Trainers secret hideout.
